unavailable.hibernation_message: Thanks for visiting. Our store is currently unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
unavailable.maintenance_message: This store is currently unavailable due to maintenance. It should be available again shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

brands.no_products: There are no products listed under this brand.

categories.no_products: There are no products listed under this category.

checkout.title: Click here to proceed to checkout

preview.checkout_multiple: or check out with multiple addresses

cart.label: Your Cart ({quantity, plural, one {# item} other {# items}})
cart.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

gift_certificates.empty_error: Please enter your valid certificate code.

gift_wrapping.title: Gift Wrapping
gift_wrapping.choose_how: Please choose how you'd like to have this item gift wrapped.
gift_wrapping.option_same: I'd like to wrap each of this item using the same wrapping options
gift_wrapping.option_different: I'd like to gift wrap each item separately
gift_wrapping.choose_type: Please choose a type of gift wrapping
gift_wrapping.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove the gift wrapping from this item?

added_to_cart.what_next: Ok, {num_products, plural, one {1 item was} other {# items were}} added to your shopping cart. What's next?
added_to_cart.your_cart_contains: Your shopping cart contains {num_products, plural, one {1 item} other {# items}}
added_to_cart.view_or_edit_cart: View or edit your shopping cart

common.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

compare.header: Comparing {products, plural, one {# Product} other {# Products}}
compare.no_remove: At least 2 products are needed to make a valid comparison.

redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.intro: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your shopping cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Shopping Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.intro: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

created.heading: Your account has been created
created.intro: Thank you for creating your account at {store_name}. Your account details have been emailed to {email}

new_customer.heading: New Customer?
new_customer.intro: Create an account with us and you'll be able to:
new_customer.fact5: Save items to your Wish List

reset_password.heading: Reset Password
reset_password.intro: Fill in your email below to request a new password. An email will be sent to the address below containing a link to verify your email address.

addresses.heading: Addresses
addresses.no_addresses: You currently have no addresses added to your profile

orders.heading: Orders
orders.none: You haven't placed any orders with us. When you do, their status will appear on this page.

return.already_returned: This order contains no products that can be returned. Have you already returned all of the items within this order?
return.why: Why are you returning these items?

list.product_details: {num_products, plural, one {1 product} other {# products}} totaling {cost}

details.heading: Order #{number}
details.ship_to_multi_text: Order will be shipped to multiple addresses
details.how_to_pay: Here's how to pay for your order:

downloads.heading: Order #{number} Downloads
downloads.download_files_below: Below you can download the files for
downloads.downloads_remaining: {number, plural, one {1 download} other {# downloads}} remaining

returns.heading: Returns
returns.error_no_qty: Please select one or more items to return.
returns.none: You haven't placed any returns with us. When you do, they will appear on this page.
returns.successful: Your return was submitted successfully. We'll respond as soon as we can.

recent_items.heading: Recently Viewed
recent_items.no_items: The items you've recently looked at on our site will appear below.

wishlists.heading: Wish Lists
wishlists.tag_line: Fill in the form below to create a new Wish List. Click the "Create Wish List" button when you're done.
wishlists.you_have_none: You have no Wish Lists, add one now.
wishlists.empty_wishlist: Your Wish List is empty. When you add items to your Wish List they will appear here.
wishlists.name: Wish List Name
wishlists.share_intro: Share this Wish List with friends:
wishlists.delete_alert: Are you sure you want to delete your Wish List(s)? This action cannot be undone.

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.
rss.heading: RSS Syndication

blog.heading: Recent Blog Posts
blog.intro: The recent post feed contains the latest {limit} blog posts published on {store}.

new.heading: New Products
new.intro: The latest products feed contains the latest {limit} products added to {store}.

popular.heading: Popular Products
popular.intro: The popular products feed contains the top {limit} most popular products on {store} as rated by users.

featured.heading: Featured Products
featured.intro: The featured products feed contains the latest {limit} featured products on {store}.

search.heading: Product Searches
search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

forms.range: You need to enter numbers only between: {limitTo} and {limitFrom}

contact_us.question: Comments/Questions
contact_us.successful: We've received your feedback and will respond shortly if required. Continue.

address.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this address?

video.heading: Promotion Video
video.subheading: Let's show an awesome video of your store

testimonials.heading: Testimonials
testimonials.text_1: A big thank you to all you guys at Progress Mobility. My scooter arrived in only 3 days and I absolutely love it. Your service from start to finish has been excellent and has made everything so easy for me
testimonials.text_2: I wish I had bought the Victory scooter I purchased from you years ago. It is an amazing machine and has allowed me to get so much more freedom. I want to thank you all at Progress Mobility.
testimonials.text_3: Being able to find the scooter I wanted and at the right price was so easy with Progress Mobility. It arrived right on time and the service was excellent. A real pleasure to deal with. Thank you.
testimonials.text_4: I purchased two scooters. Look for us riding up and down the Cape Cod Canal. . We love them. We will certainly be recommending you at every opportunity. Thank you for your great service!
